Raise UA 3 to activate Debtor
Check for modifications of relevant fields
Exits other than from ok leave WTD blank => confirm
handler propagates event, exits handled by parent
only set WTD here to store changes
... reset output parameters, to avoid calling GM100, if button Cancel is pressed
in the selection program

SQL_STMT_U.val: select ARCH_HYPA_ID,ARCH_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME from :1/arch where arch_scht_no = :2 and arch_scht_no<>0

Text.val: Only update if an existing invoice is used
if INVO_AWKAI is changed add a SILO row and -
If CLNT416_WKAPERC = 0 and (INVO_MARKCODEPSPEC = 0 or INVO_MARKCODEPSPEC
= GSET_MARKCODE (103)) then call GB101 to change the markcode of the invoice
Change in netdays, valuedate, eom, extradays or transferday call BID015 from TS

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,8}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,9}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,14}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,15}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,22}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,23}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,24}'VAR)

Text.val: begin and end marker are numeric vars in parent task which are
initialised with their own var literal resulting in the situation
x = 'x'var = varcurr(x) = varcurr('x'var)
which makes development a bit easier
Numeric pictures
Processing only required in case of a varmod
Alpha/Unicode fields
Picture: 'X' or 'X' & trim(str(len),'10')) derives from field itself
End varattr =Alpha
Numeric fields
Field name "...DAY" or "...DAYS" : picture = number of days
Field name "...PERC" : picture = percentage
Field name "...AMOUNT" : picture = percentage
Field name "...AWKAI" : picture = amount
Field name "...DISPUTEREASON" : picture = number
End varattr=Numeric
Date fields
currently only relevant for standard date format (DD.MM.YYYY)
End varattr =Date
On change of N to Y write history
Since we write history as if INVO was changed regular UFB can't be used
-- Determine if history has to be presented for INVO or INVA changes
